sourcesContent:
import bc from "./assets/bc.png";
import hashedinLogo from "./assets/hashedinLogo.png";

export const experience_data = [
  {
    name: "Beautful Code LLP",
    designation: "Full Stack Software Engineer ( Frontend Heavy )",
    totalExp: "10 months",
    startYear: "Dec 2021",
    endYear: "Present",
    img: bc,
    description:
      "Contributing as a Full Stack Developer where currently I am working for Sojern Client where I am responsible for End to End development of Custom React Components from concept to deployment in the project, Crafted new React Component using modern React APIs such as context and react Query. Also, I have worked on their core product culture.easy for which I have contributed as Frontend Developer on creating new Custom Components, Single page applications (SPA, responsive web design, UI using HTML5 grid, CSS3 media queries. Contributed as a Back-end developer to enhance the performance of existing API by improving the response time and adding up new features. Worked on creating Db design for development and Unit Testing.",
  },
  {
    name: "Hashedin by Deloitte",
    designation: "Full Stack Software Engineer ( SDE )",
    totalExp: "1 year 3 months",
    startYear: "Sep 2020",
    endYear: "Dec 2021",
    img: hashedinLogo,
    description:
      " I worked as a Full Stack Developer where worked on Frontend for Adecco Staffing Agency in building the React Components and integrating the Backend API for getting and post of some data. Contributed as a Backend Developer to create Micro-services and Enhance existing ones for the HCSC Accums unit. Enhancement of Pre-build system and adding up new features. Enhance and increase the performance of pre-developed APIs, building ReST APIs for communication and writing services to process business logic.",
  },
  {
    name: "Hashedin by Deloitte",
    designation: " Software Engineer Intern",
    totalExp: "6 months",
    startYear: "Feb 2020",
    endYear: "Sep 2020",
    img: hashedinLogo,
    description:
      " HungerBot Formulated and Developed a Food Ordering chat-bot in a team to order food from the canteen of an organization with post-paid billing features using Restful services. Contributed and Supported software engineering project as part of front-end team in Agile work environment.",
  },
];

];

export const INTRO_TEXT =
  " I'm a software engineer who specializes in building exceptional digital experiences." +
  " Currently, I'm an engineer at Tata Consultancy Services focused on building accessible, human-centered products.";
